Same time on the developers voice channel.
Hope to see you all in ~20 mins 👀

Come hangout, listen and ask any questions of the proposal authors 🤝

articles.description:
Did you know that if you are a D_D member you can get free support in looking for funding for your project? 🤔 
Send @mr_cgc or @Wikist_ a DM on Twitter or come to Discord Office Hours to get help! 🤩💸 
More info on D_D Friendly Funders page: https://buff.ly/3XMGLvY

Lens recently launched support for gating @LensProtocol publications
To show how to integrate this into a full stack app I've created + open sourced a reference architecture here:
